page.title: 20THE FAMILY
page.content: Members of the family are very supportive of each other. Each member is responsible for certain duties during the day. One child observed that he had to do the coal in his house for the fire. His brother had to feed the animals. His mother did the washing and cooked the dinner; she liked to do this. His father, however, had to go to work everyday. The family do many things together. They shop at the weekend; they eat an evening meal together; they help each other with jobs around the house and in the garden. This strength and depth of feeling for one another is an admirable quality.
